title: How to Delete All Snapchat Messages

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. It's the yellow icon with a white ghost inside. Snapchat opens to your camera screen.

steps.title: Tap your profile photo.
steps.content: Tap your profile photo. It's at the top-left corner of the camera screen. This displays your profile.

steps.title: Tap the gear icon.
steps.content: Tap the gear icon. You'll see it at the top-right corner of your profile. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Clear Conversations.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Clear Conversations . It's toward the bottom of your settings in the "Account Actions" section. A list of all conversations will appear. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the X next to a conversation you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap the X next to a conversation you want to delete. A confirmation message will appear, asking if you're sure you want to delete the conversation. [3] X Research source Clearing a conversation doesn't permanently delete the messages you've sent, nor does it delete the messages the other person sent you. [4] X Research source It just removes it from your list of conversations.

steps.title: Tap Clear to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Clear to confirm. This removes the conversation from your conversation list.

steps.title: Tap X on other conversations to clear them.
steps.content: Tap X on other conversations to clear them. To clear all conversations, you'll need to tap the X on all of the remaining conversation in the list, and then confirm each deletion.

steps.title: Prevent a conversation from reappearing in your Chats (optional).
steps.content: Prevent a conversation from reappearing in your Chats (optional). If you donâ€™t want a cleared conversation to reappear in your Chats, you'll need to block the person you were chatting with to prevent them from sending you another message. Here's how: [5] X Research source Tap your profile photo at the top-left corner of the Chats or Camera screen. Tap My Friends and then select the front you want to block. Tap the person's profile icon at the top-left. Tap the three dots at the top-right, select Block , and then tap Block to confirm. Once blocked, tap Done at the bottom, return to your friends list, and then tap the down-arrow at the top-left to close it and return to your profile. Tap the gear at the top-right corner of your profile. Scroll down to the "Who can" section and tap Contact Me . Select My Friends to ensure that only your friends can contact you, and not people you've blocked.
